Articles.Content: When I set a maneuver node, I can at most see 3(?) SOI changes. Any way to increase that?

10 minutes ago, Sorabh said:

When I set a maneuver node, I can at most see 3(?) SOI changes. Any way to increase that?

In the game settings you can change the number of conics shown, up to 6 IIRC.

You can also slap a 0m/s maneuver node on the last conic shown which will extend the number of conics shown.

You can also go into the settings.cfg file (in the root ksp directory, one up from GameData) and find "CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT = " there. Put any number you want. I think ridiculously high numbers will cause lag, but I personally use 8 and never noticed anything.
